Our Expertise

Our depth in NLP, machine learning, and deep learning, combined with our suit of cutting-edge products, ensures quick and effective AI prototyping and integration

NLP

Extensive experience in semantic search and recommendation, question answering, opinion mining, aspect-sentiment analysis, information extraction, and summarization

Deep understanding of the nuances of different data sources (blogs, video reviews, news, etc.) in various domains

Ability to handle real-world, noisy, heterogeneous data

Solutions built around state-of-the-art deep learning models such as LSTM and BERT at the core

Image Processing

Combining cutting-edge image recognition and NLP techniques for high accuracy

Ready modules for multiple use cases:

Object detection and masking for GDPR compliance

Conversational AI

Task-oriented dialog agents that stand out from run-of-the-mill chatbots

Purpose-built for product discovery engines, support assistants, and FAQ bots

Bootstrapped from available data sources (reviews, blogs, knowledge articles) for quick deployment

Easily adaptable to various domains

The Team

IBM Research, Flipkart, VMware, Reliance, Schlumberger, NCST (Govt of India research lab), multiple startups and University College Dublin. Masters/PhDs from top universities like IIT Bombay, Carnegie Mellon University (US) and University of Birmingham (UK)
Having witnessed the way the landscape of problems and solutions has evolved over nearly two decades, we understand precisely how AI can have a deep impact on your business, and have the expertise to offer you pragmatic and effective ways to turn your ideas into reality.

Anand Ramanathan

Cofounder
Anand has 15+ years of NLP and AI experience. He has developed AI solutions for varied domains including finance, language solutions, telecom, and oil & gas, while working with organizations such as NCST, IBM Research, and Schlumberger. He has research experience in machine translation (MT) and related areas. His work comprises MT systems, an information extraction and search product for financial data analytics, an open source intelligence toolkit, a ticket analytics system, etc. Anand has a PhD in computer science from IIT Bombay.

Vivek Mehta

Cofounder
Vivek has 15+ years of AI/ML experience. Before starting his entrepreneurial journey, he worked as a Data Scientist at Flipkart. In his 5+ years at Flipkart, he worked on problems related to personalization and recommendations, fraud detection and a few others. He has worked on an array of domains like demand forecasting, online advertising, handwriting recognition, machine translation, and gesture recognition while working at several different startups. Vivek holds a Masters degree from Carnegie Mellon University (US).

Vivek Nallur

Research and Academic Consultant
Vivek Nallur is an itinerant academic, currently working as a lecturer/assistant professor in University College Dublin. His main research interests are in simulation of complex systems, emergence, and autonomous and adaptive systems. He has worked with evolutionary computing, multi-agent systems and machine-learning for his research. He has a PhD from the University of Birmingham (UK) and a Masters from Carnegie Mellon University (US). In a previous avatar, he used to work in the Silicon Valley, for VMware Inc.

Based on our decades of experience in building AI products, we can help you to formulate, implement, and build high-quality AI solutions specific to your business and domain.
